name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course introduces the fundamental concepts in qualitative and quantitative research design. Students will learn the components of both approaches and the ways in which these components relate to one another, with emphasis on understanding the logic and coherence of a research study.
schedule: The course outline will be provided on the first day of class.
scorePolicy:
Attendance & Participation: 40%
Course Project & Presentation (I): 30%
Course Project & Presentation (II): 30%
